pkgmetadata.longdescription: Exploratory Analysis with the Singular Value Decomposition // A variety of descriptive multivariate analyses with the singular value decomposition, such as principal components analysis, correspondence analysis, and multidimensional scaling. See An ExPosition of the Singular Value Decomposition in R (Beaton et al 2014) doi:10.1016/j.csda.2013.11.006.
